title: Clinton Payed'Hard Drive Damission'
subtitle: The Hillary Clinton campaign has paid for data destruction companies, but there is no evidence linking these services to their controversial use of a private e-mail server.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Hillary Clinton campaign has made several payments to a company that destroys sensitive data because of an ongoing investigation into its use of e-mails while the Secretary of State was in charge of the Internet.
